content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest action, I used the 'get_text_summary' command to retrieve a summary of the Subway Surfers game from its Wikipedia page. The command was successful and returned the summary. My computer returned information that Subway Surfers is an endless runner mobile game developed by Kiloo and SYBO Games. The game has received mixed to positive reviews for its visual style and entertaining gameplay but criticized for its monotonous world and unresponsive controls. It has been downloaded over 2.7 billion times and was the most downloaded mobile game of the decade from 2012 to 2019. The game has also been adapted into an animated series. I then requested my computer to browse the Subway Surfers website for updates or events."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not mention any new updates or events happening in Subway Surfers. It provides information about the use of cookies on the Subway Surfers website. \n \n Links: ['https://cookieinformation.com/cookie-and-privacy-policy (https://cookieinformation.com/cookie-and-privacy-policy)', 'https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en (https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en)', 'https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en (https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en)', 'https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en (https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites?hl=en)', 'here (https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout)']"}]
"""
